movie.title: The Valachi Papers
movie.description_intro: When Joe Valachi (Charles Bronson) has a price put on his head by Don Vito Genovese (Lino Ventura), he must take desperate steps to protect himself while in prison. An unsuccessful attempt to slit his throat puts him over the edge to break the sacred code of silence.
movie.description_full: When Joe Valachi (Charles Bronson) has a price put on his head by Don Vito Genovese (Lino Ventura), he must take desperate steps to protect himself while in prison. An unsuccessful attempt to slit his throat puts him over the edge to break the sacred code of silence.

movies.title: Force 2
movies.summary: ACP Yashvardhan teams up with RAW Agent KK to bring down the mole within RAW.
movies.description_full: ACP Yashvardhan teams up with RAW Agent KK to bring down the mole within RAW.
movies.synopsis: ACP Yashvardhan teams up with RAW Agent KK to bring down the mole within RAW.

movies.title: Tales of Halloween
movies.summary: Named "the best horror anthology since Trick 'r Treat" by Fangoria and "among the best Halloween-themed horror movies ever made" by DailyDead, this critically acclaimed film weaves together ten chilling tales from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night.

movies.title: Zoe
movies.summary: A story about how synthetic humans can feel and even love and how the people they are involved with react to this concept.
movies.description_full: A story about how synthetic humans can feel and even love and how the people they are involved with react to this concept.
movies.synopsis: A story about how synthetic humans can feel and even love and how the people they are involved with react to this concept.

movies.title: Battle
movies.summary: Amalie works hard to fit in to a world where having it all is what matters - looks, money and dancing skills. But, when her father goes bankrupt, life as she knows it falls apart. At school, Amalie tries to pretend like nothing has happened. Then she meets Michael, the street-dancer, who is different from any other person she has met. Torn between her new life with Michael and the constant jealousy of her old friends, Amalie finds herself stuck in a continuous web of lies. How long can she keep the two worlds apart, and will she dare to be true to herself in the end?
